name: Just in slime (itch)
description: Left click to shoot, WASD to move, shift to sprint and mouse to aim. Avoid touching the slimes, they can be very enthusiastic for your Aroha. Every time you share your Aroha with 5 slimes, you randomly get one life back or a special Aroha sprinkler which lasts for 3 seconds! As you spread your Aroha, more slimes will come looking for you so be prepared for more slimes the longer you play!
